testsuite.name: FileUploadHelper Tests

testcase.name: ValidateFile should return error for empty file
ValidateFile should pass for valid file
IsDocument should return true for document files
ValidateFile should pass when no size limit set
ValidationError should store code and message
IsImage should return false for non-image files
IsVideo should return false for non-video files
ValidateFile should return error for null file
IsImage should return true for image files
IsVideo should return true for video files
IsDocument should return false for non-document files
